lead_paragraph: Tesco said it had agreed to sell its South Korean operations to a consortium of investors led by the Asian private equity firm MBK Partners for more than $6 billion.

headline.main: Seeking to Right Itself, Tesco Sells Korean Unit for $6 Billion
headline.print_headline: Seeking To Right Itself, Tesco Sells Korean Unit For $6 Billion

snippet: Tesco said it had agreed to sell its South Korean operations to a consortium of investors led by the Asian private equity firm MBK Partners for more than $6 billion.
